sentences.sContent: We can feel intensely the writer's motherly affection, sympathy, lenience and kindness by reading her works.
sentences.sContent_eng: We can feel intensely the writer's motherly affection, sympathy, lenience and kindness by reading her works.
sentences.sCn: 阅读她的作品，我们可以强烈地感受到作家如地母般的慈爱和悲悯、宽厚和善良。

sentences.sContent: We have surrounded and entrapped those who have attempted – even in the very final moments – to sabotage our good will and offers of lenience.
sentences.sContent_eng: We have surrounded and entrapped those who have attempted – even in the very final moments – to sabotage our good will and offers of lenience.
sentences.sCn: 我们已经包围并套住那些企图逃跑的-即使在最后的时刻-来阴谋破坏我们的善意和宽厚仁慈的回报。
